title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration; use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT UI; chat history, model management, multi-user, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder-style API with async, streaming, and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama instance; great starter template.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI pair-programming via Ollama; inline suggestions and chat panel.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: End-to-end RAG template with PDF ingestion, Chroma vector store, and Ollama LLM; runs fully offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and autoscaling support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy-find model switcher, conversation persistence, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, async enumerables, and both chat and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that brings local Ollama models into channels via socket-mode; mentions or DM trigger replies.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note-taking; generate summaries, rewrite text, or ask questions inside notes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama as a CI service; run LLM-based tests or generate docs in your pipelines.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama client as a provider; decorators for chat, embeddings, and model ops.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on WASM compatibility for browser and serverless environments.
